participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Energetic and supportive, loves fitness and helping others.
participant_1.background: My favorite type of music is metal. My parents live in Kentucky. I currently am engaged to my high school boyfriend. I love working out.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and adventurous, enjoys discovering new things and has a passion for food.
participant_2.background: My favorite season is summer. I am headed to the University of Michigan in the fall. I just graduated high school. I love tacos but hate spaghetti.

content.text: Hi! I'm participant_1. What's your name?
Hi, I'm participant_2.
Nice to meet you, participant_1. Where are you from?
I just graduated from high school in [user 2's hometown]. I'm headed to the University of Michigan in the fall.
That's awesome! I'm from Kentucky. What are you going to study at UMich?
I'm going to study business. What do you do for a living?
I'm a personal trainer. I love working out and I love helping people get in shape.
That's so cool! I love working out too. I'm not very good at it, but I love doing it.
I'm sure you're better than you think. What's your favorite type of workout?
I love running. I also love doing yoga.
Yoga is great! It's so good for flexibility and balance.
It is! I love how it makes me feel.
Me too! What's your favorite type of music?
I love all kinds of music, but my favorite is probably rock.
Me too! I love metal.
I've never really gotten into metal. What's your favorite band?
I love a lot of different bands, but my favorite is probably Slipknot.
I've heard of them, but I've never listened to them.
You should! They're great.
I'll check them out.
You won't be disappointed.
